nodes.text: Galin Azzameen was a male individual who was a member of the Azzameen family and the eldest son of Tomaas Azzameen. Around the time of the Galactic Empire's assault on Hoth in 3 ABY, Galin traveled to Hoth with Tomaas to supply the Alliance to Restore the Republic with bacta, though the pair managed to escape. Sometime later during another run to supply the Alliance, Galin and Tomaas were killed.
